problem_text: (V. M. Kopytov, N. Ya. Medvedev). A subgroup H of a right-orderable group G is said to be right-relatively convex if it is convex under some right ordering on G. Is the lattice of right-relatively convex subgroups of a right-orderable group always a sublattice of the lattice of its subgroups? A. V. Zenkov
